p: Curcuma longa is a medicinal herb also known as turmeric, whose major bioactive compound is represented by curcumin. Kong et al. [ 159] evaluated the effects of combined therapy with Tamoxifen and C. longa oil in rat endometriosis models. They reported that after the treatment, the volume of ectopic endometriotic foci significantly decreased, and the expression of VEGF was lower in comparison with controls.
